summary: Developed a distributed 5G core testbed on the POWDER platform by the University of Utah.

Testing developed testbed under various test cases by deploying simulated UEs (User Equipment) to evaluate distributed 5G core.

work.name: EEG Research Lab SEECS
work.project_title: A Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) Enabled Motion Intent Recognition System for Assistive Robotics
summary: Won a research grant of PKR 1 million for the project from my university.
Trained and developed an EEG classifier using parallel CNNs and RNNs to predict the intention of left, right, up, and down movements with the accuracy of 89%.
Integrated a robotic arm to be controlled using prediction from EEG classifier.
